text:
Maxwell Health | Boston, MA | Lead/Senior Software Engineer | Full-time | REMOTE

At Maxwell, we are inspired by the opportunity to make a difference in society by helping people make better health, wellness and financial decisions. We build applications that support a rich set of interactions among consumers, employers, brokers and product vendors. We view ourselves as the stewards of change for a very complex industry.

We're looking for engineers who love working with technologies like JavaScript, Node.js, TypeScript, and React.

Interested in working with an awesome team? Have team leadership experience? Reach out to Frank at frank+hn [at] maxwellhealth.com or apply online through the link below.

--

Maxwell Health: https://maxwellhealth.com/

Senior Software Engineer: https://www.workable.com/j/EA15A9BD27
